page.title: 03WEST NEWTON: Houses & Jobs
page.content:
West Newton (33 adults, 16 children)
11 have work connected with the land 8 work outside the village 8 are at home, housewives, retired or widowed 4 have no{employment} 2 are winter residents only 11 {children}are at school 5 are below school age
{ Housing}(18 dwellings)
8 council houses 2 farms, leased (from Burton Constable Estates) 1 small-holding, house freehold (land leased from the Estate) 5 privately owned homes (1 vacant) 2 disused farmhouses (now storage)
(figures: October 1985)
